name: Space Cafe (Amy Zhang)
description: Space Café is a mini game that gives the player a space to eventually unwind. Like the real world, the tasks in this game are very mundane. You’re stuck working at a busser job at this mediocre café. Everything is very bleh but once you finish your tasks, you enter this new area where it gives you a moment to just breathe. Sometimes we get so caught up in life that we forget to appreciate and reward ourselves with some peace and quiet. I want my audience to feel a sense of relief once they reach the final area because they have worked hard and they earned it.
